trans-unit.target: 如果您未使用的預設內部 CLR 反映技巧<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType>，呼叫這個屬性可以叫用<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.LookupIsXData%2A>上覆寫<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType>衍生的類別。

trans-unit.source: For more information about return values and other behavior, see the documentation for <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.LookupIsXData%2A> on this type.
trans-unit.target: 如需傳回值和其他行為的詳細資訊，請參閱文件<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.LookupIsXData%2A>這個類型上。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that provides the type information for the <see langword="Items" /> property of this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值提供此 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> 之 <see langword="Items" /> 屬性的型別資訊。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> object for the type of the items in the collection; otherwise, <see langword="null" />, if this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> does not represent a collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合中之項目型別的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> 物件，如果此 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> 不表示集合，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is only relevant if this <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType> represents a collection (<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.IsCollection%2A> is `true`).
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性才適用此<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType>代表集合 (<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.IsCollection%2A>是`true`)。

trans-unit.source: The `Items` property is whatever property holds items in that type of collection or array.
trans-unit.target: `Items`屬性是任何屬性會保留在該類型的集合或陣列中的項目。

trans-unit.source: If you do not use the default internal CLR reflection technique for a <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType>, calls to this property can invoke <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.LookupItemType%2A> overrides on <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType> derived classes.
trans-unit.target: 如果您未使用的預設內部 CLR 反映技巧<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType>，呼叫這個屬性可以叫用<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.LookupItemType%2A>上覆寫<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType>衍生的類別。

trans-unit.source: For more information about return values and other behavior, see the documentation for <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.LookupItemType%2A> on this type.
trans-unit.target: 如需傳回值和其他行為的詳細資訊，請參閱文件<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.LookupItemType%2A>這個類型上。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that provides the type information for the key property of this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />, if the <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> represents a dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，如果 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> 表示字典，則這個值提供此 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> 之索引鍵屬性的型別資訊。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> object for the type of the key for dictionary usage, otherwise, <see langword="null" />, if this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> does not represent a dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 字典用法索引鍵型別的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> 物件，如果這個 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> 不表示字典，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is only relevant if this <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType> represents a dictionary (<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.IsDictionary%2A> is `true`).
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性才適用此<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType>表示字典 (<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.IsDictionary%2A>是`true`)。

trans-unit.source: If you do not use the default internal CLR reflection technique for a <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType>, calls to this property can invoke <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.LookupKeyType%2A> overrides on <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType> derived classes.
trans-unit.target: 如果您未使用的預設內部 CLR 反映技巧<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType>，呼叫這個屬性可以叫用<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.LookupKeyType%2A>上覆寫<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType>衍生的類別。

trans-unit.source: For more information about return values and other behavior, see the documentation for <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.LookupKeyType%2A> on this type.
trans-unit.target: 如需傳回值和其他行為的詳細資訊，請參閱文件<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.LookupKeyType%2A>這個類型上。

trans-unit.source: The directive for which to find the aliased member.
trans-unit.target: 要尋找別名化成員的指示詞。

trans-unit.source: Returns the XAML member that is aliased to a XAML directive by this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回由這個 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> 別名化為 XAML 指示詞的 XAML 成員。

trans-unit.source: The aliased member, if found; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到則為別名化成員，否則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This method can be invoked when a caller gets a value from <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.GetAliasedProperty%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫者取得的值時，可以叫用此方法<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.GetAliasedProperty%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation can return results for the following XAML directives: `Key`; `Name`; `Uid`; and `xml:lang`.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作可以傳回結果的下列 XAML 指示詞： `Key`;`Name`;`Uid`; 和`xml:lang`。

trans-unit.source: Values for these depend on underlying reflection and might still return `null` if no aliased property is found.
trans-unit.target: 這些相依於基礎的反映和仍可能傳回的值`null`如果不找到任何別名屬性。

trans-unit.source: Override this method if you are not relying on default internal CLR reflection and are using metadata or other techniques for reporting the XAML type system information or the schema information of a type.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不依賴預設內部 CLR 反映，並使用中繼資料或其他技術報告的 XAML 類型系統資訊或類型的結構描述資訊，請覆寫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerable set that contains all attachable properties that are exposed by this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回可列舉的集合，這個集合包含由此 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> 公開之所有可附加的屬性。

trans-unit.source: An enumerable set that contains zero or more <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlMember" /> values; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 包含零個或更多個 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlMember" /> 值的可列舉集合，否則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This method can be invoked when a caller gets a value from <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.GetAllAttachableMembers%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫者取得的值時，可以叫用此方法<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.GetAllAttachableMembers%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Although <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.GetAllAttachableMembers%2A> returns a generic collection, this `Lookup` method returns a generic enumerable set.
trans-unit.target: 雖然<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.GetAllAttachableMembers%2A>傳回一般集合，這`Lookup`方法會傳回一般的可列舉集合。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation uses the internal CLR reflection.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作會使用內部的 CLR 反映。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.UnderlyingType%2A> is `null`, the default implementation can use <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.BaseType%2A>, if it is available.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.UnderlyingType%2A>是`null`，可以使用的預設實作<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.BaseType%2A>，如果有的話。

trans-unit.source: This behavior calls <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.LookupAllAttachableMembers%2A> recursively to attempt to find a valid base type and returns `null` if no valid base type exists.
trans-unit.target: 這個行為會呼叫<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.LookupAllAttachableMembers%2A>以遞迴方式，以嘗試尋找有效的基底型別和傳回`null`如果沒有有效的基底類型。

trans-unit.source: Override this method if you are not relying on default internal CLR reflection and are using metadata or other techniques for reporting the XAML type system information or schema information of a type.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不依賴預設內部 CLR 反映，並使用中繼資料或其他技術報告的 XAML 類型系統資訊或型別的結構描述資訊，請覆寫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: A null return should be reserved for cases where information cannot be determined because of lack of type system or reflection support.
trans-unit.target: 因為缺乏型別系統或反映支援無法判斷資訊的情況下應該保留 null 傳回。

trans-unit.source: If a type is valid and reflection or other techniques are available, but a type does not have attachable members, you should instead return an empty <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> set.
trans-unit.target: 如果型別無效和反映或其他技術可供使用，但類型沒有可附加成員，您應該改為傳回空<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>設定。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerable set that contains all the members that are exposed by this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回可列舉的集合，這個集合包含由此 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> 公開的所有成員。

trans-unit.source: An enumerable set that contains zero or more <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlMember" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 可舉列的集合，包含零個或更多個 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlMember" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: This method can be invoked when a caller gets a value from <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.GetAllMembers%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫者取得的值時，可以叫用此方法<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.GetAllMembers%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Although <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.GetAllMembers%2A> returns a generic collection, this `Lookup` method returns a generic enumerable set.
trans-unit.target: 雖然<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.GetAllMembers%2A>傳回一般集合，這`Lookup`方法會傳回一般的可列舉集合。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation uses the internal CLR reflection.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作會使用內部的 CLR 反映。

trans-unit.source: For cases where <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.UnderlyingType%2A> is `null`, the default implementation can use <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.BaseType%2A>, if it is available.
trans-unit.target: 案例其中<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.UnderlyingType%2A>是`null`，可以使用的預設實作<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.BaseType%2A>，如果有的話。

trans-unit.source: This behavior calls <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.LookupAllMembers%2A> recursively to attempt to find a valid base type, and returns `null` if no valid base type exists.
trans-unit.target: 這個行為會呼叫<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.LookupAllMembers%2A>以遞迴方式，以嘗試尋找有效的基底類型，並傳回`null`如果沒有有效的基底類型。

trans-unit.source: Override this method if you are not relying on default internal CLR reflection and are using metadata or other techniques for reporting the XAML type system information or schema information of a type.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不依賴預設內部 CLR 反映，並使用中繼資料或其他技術報告的 XAML 類型系統資訊或型別的結構描述資訊，請覆寫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: A null return should be reserved for cases where information cannot be determined because of lack of type system or reflection support.
trans-unit.target: 因為缺乏型別系統或反映支援無法判斷資訊的情況下應該保留 null 傳回。

trans-unit.source: If a type is valid, reflection or other techniques are available; if a type does not have members, you should instead return an empty <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> set.
trans-unit.target: 如果型別是有效的則使用; 的反映或其他技術如果類型沒有成員，您應該改為傳回空<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>設定。

trans-unit.source: Return values for <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.LookupAllMembers%2A> and <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.LookupAllAttachableMembers%2A> should be mutually exclusive.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.LookupAllMembers%2A>和<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.LookupAllAttachableMembers%2A>應該是互為獨佔模式。

trans-unit.source: If you have a situation where a backing type system property can support a standard instance usage as well as an attachable usage, that member should be reported as two different <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember> values, with one value appearing in the attachable list and another in the standard members list.
trans-unit.target: 如果您有支援類型系統的屬性，其中可以支援的標準執行個體的使用方式以及可附加的使用方式的情況下，該成員應該報告為兩個不同<xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember>值，並將出現在可附加的清單，而在另一個的一個值標準的成員 清單中。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of the types that are usable as the <see cref="P:System.Xaml.XamlType.ContentProperty" /> value for this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回型別的清單，這些型別可做為此 <see cref="P:System.Xaml.XamlType.ContentProperty" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: A list of possible content types.
trans-unit.target: 可能內容型別的清單。

trans-unit.source: This method can be invoked when a caller gets a value from <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.AllowedContentTypes%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫者取得的值時，可以叫用此方法<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.AllowedContentTypes%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Types that evaluate as <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.CanAssignTo%2A> for a specific content type are not considered multiple types for purposes of <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.AllowedContentTypes%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 評估為的型別<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.CanAssignTo%2A>特定內容類型不會被視為多個類型為目的<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.AllowedContentTypes%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation can use other properties of <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType> (<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.ContentWrappers%2A>, <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.ContentProperty%2A>, or <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.ItemType%2A>) to obtain a result.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作可以使用的其他屬性<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType>(<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.ContentWrappers%2A>， <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.ContentProperty%2A>，或<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.ItemType%2A>) 以取得結果。

trans-unit.source: The `Lookup` overrides for the preceding property list can also be invoked in this determination.
trans-unit.target: `Lookup`上述的屬性清單也要在這項判斷叫用之覆寫。

trans-unit.source: Override this method if you are not relying on default internal CLR reflection and are using metadata or other techniques for reporting the XAML type system information or schema information of a type.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不依賴預設內部 CLR 反映，並使用中繼資料或其他技術報告的 XAML 類型系統資訊或型別的結構描述資訊，請覆寫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The name of the attachable member to get, in <c>ownerTypeName.MemberName</c> form.
trans-unit.target: 要取得之可附加成員的名稱，格式為：<c>ownerTypeName.MemberName</c>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlMember" /> for a specific named attachable from this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />.
trans-unit.target: 從這個 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlMember" /> 以代表特定的具名可附加成員。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlMember" /> object for the requested attachable member; otherwise, <see langword="null" />, if no attachable member by that name exists.
trans-unit.target: 代表要求之可附加成員的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlMember" /> 物件；如果沒有該名稱的可附加成員存在則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This method can be invoked when a caller gets a value from <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.GetAttachableMember%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫者取得的值時，可以叫用此方法<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.GetAttachableMember%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation uses the internal CLR reflection.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作會使用內部的 CLR 反映。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.UnderlyingType%2A> is `null`, the default implementation can use <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.BaseType%2A>, if it is available.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.UnderlyingType%2A>是`null`，可以使用的預設實作<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.BaseType%2A>，如果有的話。

trans-unit.source: This behavior calls <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.LookupAttachableMember%2A> recursively to attempt to find a valid base type and returns `null` if no valid base type exists.
trans-unit.target: 這個行為會呼叫<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.LookupAttachableMember%2A>以遞迴方式，以嘗試尋找有效的基底型別和傳回`null`如果沒有有效的基底類型。

trans-unit.source: Override this method if you are not relying on default internal CLR reflection and are using metadata or other techniques for reporting the XAML type system information or schema information of a type.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不依賴預設內部 CLR 反映，並使用中繼資料或其他技術報告的 XAML 類型系統資訊或型別的結構描述資訊，請覆寫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.LookupAttachableMember%2A> is virtual, and therefore, can be overridden.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.LookupAttachableMember%2A> 是虛擬的而且因此，可以覆寫。

trans-unit.source: The override has the potential (whether for malicious purposes or otherwise) to change the reported members of a XAML type so that they no longer align in an expected way with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> `Get*` information about the underlying CLR type.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫可能會有 (不論是否適用於惡意用途或其他) 可變更報告將 XAML 類型的成員，讓不會再與預期的方式對齊<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>`Get*`基礎 CLR 類型的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: For any security-critical checks of member reporting, use the underlying CLR type instead.
trans-unit.target: 成員報告任何安全性關鍵的檢查，請改用基礎 CLR 型別。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> for the immediate base type of this XAML type.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個 XAML 型別之直接基底型別的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />。

trans-unit.source: Determination of this value is based on the underlying type of this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> and schema context.
trans-unit.target: 此值取決於這個 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> 的基礎型別和結構描述內容。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> for the immediate base type of this XAML type.
trans-unit.target: 這個 XAML 型別之直接基底型別的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />。

trans-unit.source: This method can be invoked when a caller gets a value from <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.BaseType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫者取得的值時，可以叫用此方法<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.BaseType%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation might return an internal constant that represents the <xref:System.Object> if <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.UnderlyingType%2A> is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作可能會傳回代表的內部常數<xref:System.Object>如果<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.UnderlyingType%2A>是`null`。

trans-unit.source: Override this method if you are not relying on default internal CLR reflection and are using metadata or other techniques for reporting the XAML type system information or schema information of a type.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不依賴預設內部 CLR 反映，並使用中繼資料或其他技術報告的 XAML 類型系統資訊或型別的結構描述資訊，請覆寫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.LookupBaseType%2A> is virtual, and therefore, can be overridden.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.LookupBaseType%2A> 是虛擬的而且因此，可以覆寫。

trans-unit.source: The override has the potential (whether for malicious purposes or otherwise) to change the reported type information about a XAML type so that it no longer aligns in an expected way with the type system information of its underlying CLR type.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫有可能 (不論是否適用於惡意用途或其他) 變更 XAML 類型的報告的類型資訊，使它不再符合預期的方式及其基礎 CLR 類型的型別系統資訊。

trans-unit.source: For any security-critical checks of assignment operations and access, use the underlying CLR type instead.
trans-unit.target: 指派作業和存取的任何安全性關鍵的檢查，請改用基礎 CLR 型別。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value of the <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Schema.XamlCollectionKind" /> enumeration that declares which specific collection type this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> uses.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Schema.XamlCollectionKind" /> 列舉的值，這個值宣告此 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> 使用的特定集合型別。

trans-unit.source: A value of the <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Schema.XamlCollectionKind" /> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Schema.XamlCollectionKind" /> 列舉的值。

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked by an internal private method (no public `CollectionKind` or `GetCollectionKind` API exists on <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType>).
trans-unit.target: 內部私用方法所叫用此方法 (沒有公用`CollectionKind`或`GetCollectionKind`API 存在於<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType>)。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation uses the internal CLR reflection.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作會使用內部的 CLR 反映。

trans-unit.source: For cases where <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.UnderlyingType%2A> is `null`, the default implementation can use <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.BaseType%2A>, if it is available.
trans-unit.target: 案例其中<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.UnderlyingType%2A>是`null`，可以使用的預設實作<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.BaseType%2A>，如果有的話。

trans-unit.source: This behavior indirectly calls <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.LookupCollectionKind%2A> recursively to attempt to find a valid base type; it returns <xref:System.Xaml.Schema.XamlCollectionKind.None?displayProperty=nameWithType> if no valid base type exists.
trans-unit.target: 這個行為會間接呼叫<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.LookupCollectionKind%2A>以遞迴方式嘗試找不到有效的基底類型; 它會傳回<xref:System.Xaml.Schema.XamlCollectionKind.None?displayProperty=nameWithType>如果沒有有效的基底類型。

trans-unit.source: In general, the default implementation attempts to find the `Add` method of the underlying type by reflection.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作一般情況下，會嘗試尋找`Add`所反映的基礎類型的方法。

trans-unit.source: If found, the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> of the `Add` method is enough information to determine which <xref:System.Xaml.Schema.XamlCollectionKind> value should be returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到，<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>的`Add`方法是足夠的資訊來判斷哪些<xref:System.Xaml.Schema.XamlCollectionKind>應該傳回值。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it returns <xref:System.Xaml.Schema.XamlCollectionKind.None?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 否則它會傳回 <xref:System.Xaml.Schema.XamlCollectionKind.None?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Override this method if you are not relying on default internal CLR reflection and are using metadata or other techniques for reporting the XAML type system information or schema information of a type.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不依賴預設內部 CLR 反映，並使用中繼資料或其他技術報告的 XAML 類型系統資訊或型別的結構描述資訊，請覆寫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> must have arguments (generic constraints through <see langword="x:TypeArguments" />, initialization text, or other XAML techniques) to construct a valid instance of the type.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，這個值表示此 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> 是否必須有引數 (透過 <see langword="x:TypeArguments" /> 的泛型條件約束、初始設定文字或其他 XAML 技術)，才能建構型別的有效執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if construction of an instance requires some argument value; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: 如果建構執行個體時需要一些引數值，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 false。

trans-unit.source: This method can be invoked when a caller gets a value from <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.ConstructionRequiresArguments%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫者取得的值時，可以叫用此方法<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.ConstructionRequiresArguments%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation returns `false` for types considered value types in the CLR type system.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作會傳回`false`類型被視為在 CLR 中的實值類型的型別系統。

trans-unit.source: For other than value types, CLR reflection <xref:System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo> is used to determine whether a default constructor exists.
trans-unit.target: 適用於其他實值類型，CLR 反映比<xref:System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo>用來判斷是否已存在的預設建構函式。

trans-unit.source: Override this method if you are not relying on default internal CLR reflection and are using metadata or other techniques for reporting the XAML type system information or schema information of a type.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不依賴預設內部 CLR 反映，並使用中繼資料或其他技術報告的 XAML 類型系統資訊或型別的結構描述資訊，請覆寫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlMember" /> information for the content property of this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlMember" /> 之內容屬性的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> 資訊。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlMember" /> information for the content property of this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlMember" /> 之內容屬性的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> 資訊。

trans-unit.source: May be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 可以是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This method can be invoked when a caller gets a value from <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.ContentProperty%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫者取得的值時，可以叫用此方法<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.ContentProperty%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation checks for <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ContentPropertyAttribute> on the type definition.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作會檢查<xref:System.Windows.Markup.ContentPropertyAttribute>的類型定義。

trans-unit.source: It can also check <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.BaseType%2A> for the attribute if no attribute is found on the immediate underlying type.
trans-unit.target: 它也可以檢查<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.BaseType%2A>如果屬性不立即的基礎類型上找到的屬性。

trans-unit.source: If these checks do not discover a content type, the default implementation returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 若這些檢查不會發現內容類型，則預設實作會傳回`null`。

trans-unit.source: Override this method if you are not relying on default internal CLR reflection and are using metadata or other techniques for reporting the XAML type system information or schema information of a type.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不依賴預設內部 CLR 反映，並使用中繼資料或其他技術報告的 XAML 類型系統資訊或型別的結構描述資訊，請覆寫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> values that represent the content wrappers for this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> 值的清單，這些值表示這個 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> 的內容包裝函式。

trans-unit.source: A list of <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> values that represent the content wrappers for this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> 值的清單，表示這個 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> 的內容包裝函式。

trans-unit.source: A content wrapper is a class that represents the content collection type when the types that are used in that collection are not contiguous to the type system.
trans-unit.target: 內容的包裝函式是類別，表示內容的集合型別時使用該集合中的類型不是連續類型系統。

trans-unit.source: The types of collection items for the content wrapper are expected to be limited in some manner beyond <xref:System.Object> or a neutral object equivalent.
trans-unit.target: 預期的內容包裝函式的集合項目類型以外的某種方式來限制<xref:System.Object>或中性的物件相等。

trans-unit.source: However, this limitation is only enforced by the design or purpose of the properties that use that type, and not by the type system.
trans-unit.target: 不過，這項限制只強制執行的設計或使用該型別，屬性的目的，而不是由型別系統。

trans-unit.source: More than one content wrapper can exist on a type.
trans-unit.target: 型別可以存在多個內容包裝函式。

trans-unit.source: For an example class and scenario from the WPF XAML implementation, see <xref:System.Windows.Documents.InlineCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 範例類別和 WPF XAML 實作的案例，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Documents.InlineCollection>。

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, returns an <see cref="T:System.Reflection.ICustomAttributeProvider" /> implementation.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中實作時，傳回 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.ICustomAttributeProvider" /> 實作。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Reflection.ICustomAttributeProvider" /> implementation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Reflection.ICustomAttributeProvider" /> 實作。

trans-unit.source: Override this method to provide the internal reflection with an alternative way to obtain CLR attribute values.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫這個方法以提供的替代方法，若要取得 CLR 屬性值與內部的反映。

trans-unit.source: In absence of an override, the internal reflector uses typical CLR reflection logic.
trans-unit.target: 在沒有覆寫時，內部反映程式會使用一般 CLR 反映邏輯。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作會傳回 `null`。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Schema.XamlValueConverter`1" /> object, which is used for deferred loading of XAML-declared objects.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Schema.XamlValueConverter`1" /> 物件，這個物件用於延後載入 XAML 宣告的物件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Schema.XamlValueConverter`1" /> that has a <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDeferringLoader" /> constraint on the generic.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Schema.XamlValueConverter`1" />，具有對泛型的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDeferringLoader" /> 條件約束。

trans-unit.source: This method can be invoked when a caller gets a value from <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.DeferringLoader%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫者取得的值時，可以叫用此方法<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.DeferringLoader%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Override this method if you want <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.DeferringLoader%2A> to return a different value than is enabled by default internal reflection and are also providing custom <xref:System.Xaml.Schema.XamlTypeInvoker> information.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要覆寫此方法<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.DeferringLoader%2A>傳回不同的值超過預設內部反映會啟用，而且也提供自訂<xref:System.Xaml.Schema.XamlTypeInvoker>資訊。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation returns an object on the basis of reading <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlDeferLoadAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作會傳回根據讀取物件<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlDeferLoadAttribute>。

trans-unit.source: It can also check <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.BaseType%2A> for the attribute if no attribute is found on the immediate underlying type.
trans-unit.target: 它也可以檢查<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.BaseType%2A>如果屬性不立即的基礎類型上找到的屬性。

trans-unit.source: If a value is unavailable, this method returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果值是無法使用，則這個方法會傳回`null`。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Schema.XamlTypeInvoker" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回與這個 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Schema.XamlTypeInvoker" /> 相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Schema.XamlTypeInvoker" /> information for this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Schema.XamlTypeInvoker" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> 資訊，否則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This method can be invoked by calls to <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.Invoker%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 可以叫用此方法的呼叫才能<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.Invoker%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation does not require that a <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType> be constructed by using one of the constructors that pass an initial <xref:System.Xaml.Schema.XamlTypeInvoker>.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作不需要<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType>使用其中一種傳遞初始的建構函式會建構<xref:System.Xaml.Schema.XamlTypeInvoker>。

trans-unit.source: However, an <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.UnderlyingType%2A> value must exist for the <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType>; otherwise, the default implementation returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 不過，<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.UnderlyingType%2A>值必須存在<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType>; 否則預設實作會傳回`null`。

trans-unit.source: Override this method if you also create a derived class from <xref:System.Xaml.Schema.XamlTypeInvoker> and intend to return the derived class.
trans-unit.target: 如果您也可以建立衍生的類別中覆寫這個方法<xref:System.Xaml.Schema.XamlTypeInvoker>，而且想要傳回衍生的類別。

trans-unit.source: If you return `null`, <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.Invoker%2A> returns <xref:System.Xaml.Schema.XamlTypeInvoker.UnknownInvoker%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to callers.
trans-unit.target: 如果您傳回`null`，<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.Invoker%2A>傳回<xref:System.Xaml.Schema.XamlTypeInvoker.UnknownInvoker%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>給呼叫端。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> represents an ambient type, as per the XAML definition.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，這個值表示此 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> 是否代表符合 XAML 定義的環境型別。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> represents an ambient type; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> 表示環境型別，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method can be invoked by calls to <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.IsAmbient%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 可以叫用此方法的呼叫才能<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.IsAmbient%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation uses CLR reflection on the <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.UnderlyingType%2A> and can check the base types.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作會使用上的 CLR 反映<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.UnderlyingType%2A>會檢查基底型別。

trans-unit.source: This implementation checks for the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.AmbientAttribute> that is applied to the relevant type's definition at the class level and returns `true` in this case.
trans-unit.target: 此實作會檢查<xref:System.Windows.Markup.AmbientAttribute>，套用至類別層級的相關的類型定義，並傳回`true`在此情況下。

trans-unit.source: All other cases return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 所有其他情況下傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: Override this method if you want <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.IsAmbient%2A> to return a different value than is enabled by default internal reflection.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要覆寫此方法<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.IsAmbient%2A>傳回不同的值，比預設內部反映會啟用。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> represents a constructible type, as per the XAML definition.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，這個值表示此 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> 是否代表符合 XAML 定義的可建構型別。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> represents a constructible type; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> 表示可建構的型別則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method can be invoked by calls to <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.IsConstructible%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 可以叫用此方法的呼叫才能<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.IsConstructible%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation uses CLR reflection on the <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.UnderlyingType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作會使用上的 CLR 反映<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.UnderlyingType%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The type must be concrete, non-nested, and closed.
trans-unit.target: 類型必須是具象、 非巢狀，和已關閉。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation checks whether the type is a value type and the return of <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.ConstructionRequiresArguments%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作會檢查型別是實值類型和傳回<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.ConstructionRequiresArguments%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For a null <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.UnderlyingType%2A>, this method returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Null <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.UnderlyingType%2A>，這個方法會傳回`true`。

trans-unit.source: Override this method if you want <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.IsConstructible%2A> to return a different value than is enabled by default internal reflection.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要覆寫此方法<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.IsConstructible%2A>傳回不同的值，比預設內部反映會啟用。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> represents a markup extension.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，這個值表示此 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> 是否代表標記延伸。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> represents a markup extension; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> 表示標記延伸，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method can be invoked by calls to <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.IsMarkupExtension%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 可以叫用此方法的呼叫才能<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.IsMarkupExtension%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation consists only of this call:
trans-unit.target: 預設實作只包含此呼叫：

trans-unit.source: Override this method if you want <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.IsMarkupExtension%2A> to use different logic.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要覆寫此方法<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.IsMarkupExtension%2A>使用不同的邏輯。

trans-unit.source: In XAML specification terms, this type must be assignable to `x:MarkupExtension` in order to return `true` for <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.IsMarkupExtension%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 在 XAML 規格詞彙中，此類型必須是可指派給`x:MarkupExtension`以傳回`true`如<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.IsMarkupExtension%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> represents a XAML namescope, as per the XAML definition.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，這個值表示此 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> 是否代表符合 XAML 定義的 XAML 名稱範圍。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> represents a XAML namescope; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> 表示 XAML 名稱範圍，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method can be invoked by calls to <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.IsNameScope%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 可以叫用此方法的呼叫才能<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.IsNameScope%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation makes a <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.CanAssignTo%2A> call indirectly against the type <xref:System.Windows.Markup.INameScope>.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作會<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.CanAssignTo%2A>針對型別間接呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Markup.INameScope>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Markup.INameScope> is an interface that is defined in the assembly WindowsBase.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Markup.INameScope> 是 WindowsBase 組件中定義的介面。

trans-unit.source: This technique for XAML namescope identification is used both by WPF and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_workflow](~/includes/tlasharptla-workflow-md.md)] implementations of XAML.
trans-unit.target: 在使用 XAML namescope 識別這項技術都 WPF 和[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_workflow](~/includes/tlasharptla-workflow-md.md)]的 XAML 實作。

trans-unit.source: Override this method if you want <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.IsNameScope%2A> to use different logic.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要覆寫此方法<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.IsNameScope%2A>使用不同的邏輯。

trans-unit.source: A XAML namescope enforces the name uniqueness of the property or properties that are used for `x:Name` / `[name property]`.
trans-unit.target: XAML 名稱範圍會強制執行的或多個所使用的屬性名稱唯一性`x:Name` / `[name property]`。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.IsNameScope%2A> is `true`, then some mechanism for enforcing uniqueness should exist and should evaluate from the perspective of this type owning a XAML namescope.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.IsNameScope%2A>是`true`，則應該存在，且應該評估從這個類型擁有 XAML 名稱範圍的觀點來看一些機制來強制執行唯一性。

trans-unit.source: The XAML namescope then extends to the content of the type until another XAML namescope owning type is encountered.
trans-unit.target: XAML 名稱範圍然後會延伸到類型的內容之前遇到另一個 XAML 名稱範圍擁有者型別。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> represents a nullable type, as per the XAML definition.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，這個值表示此 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> 是否代表符合 XAML 定義之可為 Null 的型別。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> represents a nullable type; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> 表示可為 Null 的型別則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method can be invoked by calls to <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.IsNullable%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 可以叫用此方法的呼叫才能<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.IsNullable%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation makes a determination based on the CLR core library nullable concept, checked against <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.UnderlyingType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作會判定概念為基礎 CLR 核心程式庫可為 null，根據檢查<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.UnderlyingType%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For a null <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.UnderlyingType%2A>, it returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Null <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.UnderlyingType%2A>，它會傳回`true`。

trans-unit.source: Override this method if you want <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.IsNullable%2A> to use different logic.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要覆寫此方法<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.IsNullable%2A>使用不同的邏輯。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> represents a public type in the relevant type system.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，這個值表示此 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> 是否代表相關型別系統中的公用型別。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> represents a public type; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> 表示公用型別則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method can be invoked by calls to <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.IsPublic%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 可以叫用此方法的呼叫才能<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.IsPublic%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation uses CLR reflection against a non-null <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.UnderlyingType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作會使用針對非 null 的 CLR 反映<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.UnderlyingType%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For a null <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.UnderlyingType%2A>, it returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Null <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.UnderlyingType%2A>，它會傳回`true`。

trans-unit.source: Override this method if you want <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.IsPublic%2A> to use different logic.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要覆寫此方法<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.IsPublic%2A>使用不同的邏輯。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.LookupIsPublic%2A> is virtual, and therefore, can be overridden.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.LookupIsPublic%2A> 是虛擬的而且因此，可以覆寫。

trans-unit.source: The override has the potential (whether for malicious purposes or otherwise) to change the reported access information about a XAML type so that it no longer aligns in an expected way with the type system or access information of its underlying CLR type.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫有可能 (不論是否適用於惡意用途或其他) 變更 XAML 類型的報告的存取資訊，使它不再符合預期的方式基礎 CLR 型別的型別系統或存取資訊。

trans-unit.source: For any security-critical checks of assignment operations and access, use the underlying CLR type instead.
trans-unit.target: 指派作業和存取的任何安全性關鍵的檢查，請改用基礎 CLR 型別。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> represents a type that cannot be resolved in the underlying type system.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，這個值表示此 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> 是否代表基礎型別系統中無法解析的型別。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation can use CLR reflection.

trans-unit.source: For a null <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.UnderlyingType%2A>, it returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Null <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.UnderlyingType%2A>，它會傳回`true`。

trans-unit.target: 如果您想要覆寫此方法<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.IsUnknown%2A>使用不同的邏輯。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation can use CLR reflection concepts, such as checking for an `Add` method by <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> and using the <xref:System.Reflection.ParameterInfo>; checking <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.IsArray%2A>; and checking <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.BaseType%2A> and trying the same logic there.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to return a member even if that member has a <see langword="true" /> value for <see cref="P:System.Xaml.XamlMember.IsReadOnly" />; <see langword="false" /> to not return a <see cref="P:System.Xaml.XamlMember.IsReadOnly" /> member.

trans-unit.source: The override has the potential (whether for malicious purposes or otherwise) to change the reported members of a XAML type so that they no longer align in an expected way with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> `Get*` information about the underlying CLR type.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫可能會有 (不論是否適用於惡意用途或其他) 可變更報告將 XAML 類型的成員，讓不會再與預期的方式對齊<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>`Get*`基礎 CLR 類型的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: For any security-critical checks of member reporting, use the underlying CLR type instead.
trans-unit.target: 成員報告任何安全性關鍵的檢查，請改用基礎 CLR 型別。

trans-unit.source: The count (arity) of the particular syntax or constructor mode that you want information about.
trans-unit.target: 您想要取得相關資訊之特定語法或建構函式模式的計數 (Arity)。

trans-unit.source: For markup extension types, returns the types of the positional parameters that are supported in a specific markup extension usage for this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果是標記延伸型別，則傳回這個 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> 的特定標記延伸用法所支援之位置參數的型別。

trans-unit.source: A list of <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> values where each such <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> is the type for that position in the syntax.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> 值的清單，其中每個 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> 都是語法中該位置適用的型別。

trans-unit.source: You must specify those types in the same order when supplying markup input for the markup extension.
trans-unit.target: 為標記延伸提供標記輸入時，您必須以相同順序指定這些型別。

trans-unit.source: This method can be invoked by calls to <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.GetPositionalParameters%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 可以叫用此方法的呼叫才能<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.GetPositionalParameters%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation uses internal reflection information based on finding constructors and checking the arity.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作會使用內部的反映資訊以尋找建構函式和檢查引數數目。

trans-unit.source: Override this method if you want <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.GetPositionalParameters%2A> to use different logic.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要覆寫此方法<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.GetPositionalParameters%2A>使用不同的邏輯。

trans-unit.source: This API is only relevant if this <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType> represents a markup extension (<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.IsMarkupExtension%2A> is `true`).
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 才適用此<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType>代表標記延伸 (<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.IsMarkupExtension%2A>是`true`)。

trans-unit.source: The input `parameterCount` is not for requesting the type of a specific positional parameter.
trans-unit.target: 輸入`parameterCount`不是用來要求特定的位置參數的類型。

trans-unit.source: It is for specifying the arity of a markup extension usage.
trans-unit.target: 它可用於指定的標記延伸使用方式的引數數目。

trans-unit.source: Markup extension usage often has multiple signatures and uses different parameter arity (count) of positional parameters to differentiate.
trans-unit.target: 標記延伸使用方式通常有多個簽章，而且使用不同的參數 arity （計數） 的位置參數來區分。

trans-unit.source: However, you can configure a schema context to allow duplicate arities and use types of the positional parameters for differentiation.
trans-unit.target: 不過，您可以設定以允許重複的 arities，使用的位置參數的型別區分的結構描述內容。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext.SupportMarkupExtensionsWithDuplicateArity%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext.SupportMarkupExtensionsWithDuplicateArity%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For a specific arity count, the parameter positions and types can vary.
trans-unit.target: 用特定的 arity count 參數位置和類型而有所不同。

trans-unit.source: To get the positional type of a specific arity's markup extension usage, you first call <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.GetPositionalParameters%2A> with the arity count.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得特定 arity 的標記延伸使用方式的位置類型，您先呼叫<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.GetPositionalParameters%2A>引數數目計數。

trans-unit.source: Then get the item at that position from the returned collection.
trans-unit.target: 然後從傳回的集合，該位置取得項目。

trans-unit.source: Returns a handler callback to use for the set operations of markup extensions.
trans-unit.target: 傳回用於標記延伸設定作業的處理常式回呼。

trans-unit.source: A handler callback to use for the set operations of markup extensions.
trans-unit.target: 用於標記延伸設定作業的處理常式回呼。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation returns a value based on reading <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlSetMarkupExtensionAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作會傳回值，根據讀取<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlSetMarkupExtensionAttribute>。

trans-unit.source: It can also check <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.BaseType%2A> for the attribute if no attribute is found on the immediate underlying type.
trans-unit.target: 它也可以檢查<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.BaseType%2A>如果屬性不立即的基礎類型上找到的屬性。

trans-unit.source: If a value is unavailable, it returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果值是無法使用，它會傳回`null`。

trans-unit.source: Returns a handler to use for type converter setting cases.
trans-unit.target: 傳回用於型別轉換子設定案例的處理常式。

trans-unit.source: A handler to use for type converter setting cases.
trans-unit.target: 用於型別轉換子設定案例的處理常式。

trans-unit.source: It can also check <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.BaseType%2A> for the attribute if no attribute is found on the immediate underlying type.
trans-unit.target: 它也可以檢查<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.BaseType%2A>如果屬性不立即的基礎類型上找到的屬性。

trans-unit.source: If a value is unavailable, it returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果值是無法使用，它會傳回`null`。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> should be serialized using a mode that trims surrounding whitespace.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，這個值表示此 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> 是否應使用修剪前後空白字元的模式進行序列化。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> should be serialized in a mode that trims surrounding whitespace; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> 應以修剪前後空白字元的模式進行序列化則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method can be invoked by calls to <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.TrimSurroundingWhitespace%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 可以叫用此方法的呼叫才能<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.TrimSurroundingWhitespace%2A>。

trans-unit.target: 預設實作會傳回值，根據讀取<xref:System.Windows.Markup.TrimSurroundingWhitespaceAttribute>。

trans-unit.source: It can also check <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.BaseType%2A> for the attribute if no attribute is found on the immediate underlying type.
trans-unit.target: 它也可以檢查<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.BaseType%2A>如果屬性不立即的基礎類型上找到的屬性。

trans-unit.source: If a value is unavailable, it returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果值是無法使用，它會傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Schema.XamlValueConverter`1" /> that has a <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter" /> constraint, which represents type-conversion behavior for values of this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回具有 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Schema.XamlValueConverter`1" /> 條件約束的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter" />，這個條件約束表示此 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> 之值的型別轉換行為。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Schema.XamlValueConverter`1" /> with <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter" /> constraint that represents type-conversion behavior for values of this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 具有 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Schema.XamlValueConverter`1" /> 條件約束的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter" /> (這個條件約束表示此 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> 之值的型別轉換行為)，否則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This method can be invoked by calls to <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.TypeConverter%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 可以叫用此方法的呼叫才能<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.TypeConverter%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation returns a value based on reading <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作會傳回值，根據讀取<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute>。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation can also check <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.BaseType%2A> for the attribute if no attribute is found on the immediate underlying type.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作也可以檢查<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.BaseType%2A>如果屬性不立即的基礎類型上找到的屬性。

trans-unit.source: It also includes special logic for default conversion of enumerations, common value types, and generics.
trans-unit.target: 它也包含特殊邏輯，列舉型別、 常見的實值類型和泛型的預設轉換。

trans-unit.source: If a value is unavailable, it returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果值是無法使用，它會傳回`null`。

trans-unit.source: Override this method if you want <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.TypeConverter%2A> to use different logic.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要覆寫此方法<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.TypeConverter%2A>使用不同的邏輯。

trans-unit.source: Returns the CLR <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that underlies this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回做為此 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 之基礎的 CLR <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />。

trans-unit.source: The CLR <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that underlies this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 做為此 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 之基礎的 CLR <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />，否則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This method can be invoked by calls to <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.UnderlyingType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 可以叫用此方法的呼叫才能<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.UnderlyingType%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation returns an internal field.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作會傳回內部欄位。

trans-unit.source: That field is generally initialized during construction and its value is based on which constructor was called and the information that you provided.
trans-unit.target: 通常在建構時初始化該欄位，其值根據呼叫的建構函式和您所提供的資訊。

trans-unit.source: Override this method if you want <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.UnderlyingType%2A> to use different logic.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要覆寫此方法<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.UnderlyingType%2A>使用不同的邏輯。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> is built top-down during XAML initialization.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，這個值表示在 XAML 初始化期間是否由上往下建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> is built top-down during XAML initialization; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在 XAML 初始化期間由上往下建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Top-down is a metaphor that approximates XAML processor behavior when it creates the object graph.
trans-unit.target: 由上而下是近似於 XAML 處理器的行為，會在建立物件圖形時的字眼。

trans-unit.source: When built top-down, a type is instantiated, attached to the parent, and has its properties set.
trans-unit.target: 建立時由上而下，型別會具現化，附加至父代，並設定其屬性。

trans-unit.source: Top-down construction avoids invoking property-changed handlers multiple times.
trans-unit.target: 由上而下建構可避免多次叫用屬性變更處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Such handling ripples up the object graph and therefore, eliminates the multiple handler calls and provides a performance optimization for startup of the object graph.
trans-unit.target: 這類處理 ripples 向上物件圖形和因此，排除多個處理常式呼叫，並提供用於啟動的效能最佳化的物件圖形。

trans-unit.source: This method can be invoked by calls to <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.IsUsableDuringInitialization%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 可以叫用此方法的呼叫才能<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.IsUsableDuringInitialization%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation returns a value based on reading <xref:System.Windows.Markup.UsableDuringInitializationAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作會傳回值，根據讀取<xref:System.Windows.Markup.UsableDuringInitializationAttribute>。

trans-unit.source: It can also check <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.BaseType%2A> for the attribute if no attribute is found on the immediate underlying type.
trans-unit.target: 它也可以檢查<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.BaseType%2A>如果屬性不立即的基礎類型上找到的屬性。

trans-unit.source: If a value is unavailable, it returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果值是無法使用，它會傳回`false`。

trans-unit.target: 如果您想要覆寫此方法<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.IsUsableDuringInitialization%2A>使用不同的邏輯。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Schema.XamlValueConverter`1" /> that has a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.ValueSerializer" /> constraint, which represents value serialization behavior for values of this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回具有 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Schema.XamlValueConverter`1" /> 條件約束的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.ValueSerializer" />，這個條件約束表示此 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> 之值的值序列化行為。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Schema.XamlValueConverter`1" /> with <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.ValueSerializer" /> constraint that represents value serialization behavior for values of this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 具有 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Schema.XamlValueConverter`1" /> 條件約束的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.ValueSerializer" /> (這個條件約束表示此 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> 之值的值序列化行為)，否則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This method can be invoked by calls to <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.ValueSerializer%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 可以叫用此方法的呼叫才能<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.ValueSerializer%2A>。

trans-unit.target: 它也可以檢查<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.BaseType%2A>如果屬性不立即的基礎類型上找到的屬性。

trans-unit.source: It also includes special logic for default serialization of enumerations, common value types, or generics.
trans-unit.target: 它也包含特殊邏輯，預設序列化列舉型別、 常見的實值類型或泛型。

trans-unit.source: If a value is unavailable, it returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果值是無法使用，它會傳回`null`。

trans-unit.source: Override this method if you want <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.ValueSerializer%2A> to use different logic.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要覆寫此方法<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.ValueSerializer%2A>使用不同的邏輯。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that provides the type information for the returned <see langword="ProvideValue" /> of this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />, if it represents a markup extension.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值提供此 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> (如果表示標記延伸的話) 傳回之 <see langword="ProvideValue" /> 的型別資訊。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> object for the return type for markup extension usage; otherwise, <see langword="null" />, if this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> does not represent a markup extension.
trans-unit.target: 標記延伸使用方式之傳回型別的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> 物件，如果這個 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> 不表示標記延伸，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is only relevant if this <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType> represents a markup extension (`x:MarkupExtension` is in the assignable types list).
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性才適用此<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType>代表標記延伸 (`x:MarkupExtension`指派的型別清單中)。

trans-unit.source: If you do not use the default internal CLR reflection technique for a <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType>, calls to this property can invoke <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.LookupMarkupExtensionReturnType%2A> overrides on <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType> derived classes.
trans-unit.target: 如果您未使用的預設內部 CLR 反映技巧<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType>，呼叫這個屬性可以叫用<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.LookupMarkupExtensionReturnType%2A>上覆寫<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType>衍生的類別。

trans-unit.source: For more information about return values and other behavior, see the documentation for <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.LookupMarkupExtensionReturnType%2A> on this type.
trans-unit.target: 如需傳回值和其他行為的詳細資訊，請參閱文件<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.LookupMarkupExtensionReturnType%2A>這個類型上。

trans-unit.source: Gets the string name of the type that this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> represents.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> 表示之型別的字串名稱。

trans-unit.source: The string name of this XAML type.
trans-unit.target: 這個 XAML 型別的字串名稱。

trans-unit.source: This property typically gets the schema-constructed name (per the <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.%23ctor%2A> signature), or the name of the <xref:System.Type>, if it is constructed by using the pertinent constructor of the CLR type system.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性通常會取得結構描述建構名稱 (每個<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.%23ctor%2A>簽章)，或名稱<xref:System.Type>，如果它使用相關的建構函式的 CLR 型別系統所建構。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> or <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> 或 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> or <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> 或 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two specified <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> objects have the same value.
trans-unit.target: 判斷兩個指定的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> 物件是否具有相同的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the value of <paramref name="xamlType1" /> is the same as the value of <paramref name="xamlType2" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 的值與 <paramref name="xamlType1" /> 的值相同，則為 <paramref name="xamlType2" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> or <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> 或 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> or <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> 或 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two specified <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> objects have different values.
trans-unit.target: 判斷兩個指定的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> 物件是否具有不同的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the value of <paramref name="xamlType1" /> is different from the value of <paramref name="xamlType2" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 的值與 <paramref name="xamlType1" /> 的值不同，則為 <paramref name="xamlType2" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.target: 取得單一 XAML 命名空間，這是此 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> 的主要 XAML 命名空間。

trans-unit.source: The identifier, as a string, of the primary XAML namespace for this XAML type.
trans-unit.target: 這個 XAML 型別之主要 XAML 命名空間的識別項 (字串形式)。

trans-unit.source: This implementation provides the same value as calling <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.GetXamlNamespaces%2A> and then getting the first value string from the returned enumerable set.
trans-unit.target: 此實作會提供相同的值與呼叫<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.GetXamlNamespaces%2A>然後從傳回的可列舉集合中取得的第一個值的字串。

trans-unit.source: Gets the active <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext" /> for processing this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得處理這個 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext" /> 的作用中 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />。

trans-unit.source: The active <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext" /> for processing this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />.
trans-unit.target: 用於處理這個 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext" /> 的作用中 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext> is a required parameter entry when constructing a <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext> 建構時是必要的參數的項目<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string representation of this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> 的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: A string representation of this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> 的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType> implementation of <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A> returns the <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.Name%2A> property of the <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType>實作<xref:System.Object.ToString%2A>傳回<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.Name%2A>屬性<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> has whitespace handling behavior for serialization that trims the surrounding whitespace in its content.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示此 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> 是否有序列化的空白字元處理行為會修剪其內容中的前後空白字元。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> represents a type that uses whitespace trimming; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> 表示使用空白修剪的型別，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If you do not use the default internal CLR reflection technique for a <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType>, calls to this property can invoke <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.LookupIsWhitespaceSignificantCollection%2A> overrides on <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType> derived classes.
trans-unit.target: 如果您未使用的預設內部 CLR 反映技巧<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType>，呼叫這個屬性可以叫用<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.LookupIsWhitespaceSignificantCollection%2A>上覆寫<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType>衍生的類別。

trans-unit.source: For more information about return values and other behavior, see the documentation for <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.LookupIsWhitespaceSignificantCollection%2A> on this type.
trans-unit.target: 如需傳回值和其他行為的詳細資訊，請參閱文件<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.LookupIsWhitespaceSignificantCollection%2A>這個類型上。

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of type arguments for cases where this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> represents a generic.
trans-unit.target: 當這個 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> 表示泛型時，取得型別引數的清單。

trans-unit.source: A list of type argument types; otherwise, <see langword="null" />, if this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> does not represent a generic.
trans-unit.target: 型別引數型別的清單，如果這個 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> 不表示泛型，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: There are certain scenarios for a <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType> where calling the <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.TypeArguments%2A> parameter returns a list where the types are still open.
trans-unit.target: 在某些案例的<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType>其中呼叫<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.TypeArguments%2A>參數傳回清單，其中型別為仍開啟。

trans-unit.source: In this case, one or more of the returned <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType> values will have placeholder values for <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, such as `T`, to represent that the generic is still open.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，一或多個傳回<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType>值將會擁有預留位置值<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，例如`T`，以代表的泛型仍為開啟。

trans-unit.source: This scenario can occur if you get a <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType> from a call to <xref:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext.GetXamlType%2A>, instead of from a XAML reader implementation.
trans-unit.target: 如果您收到，可能會發生這個狀況<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType>呼叫<xref:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext.GetXamlType%2A>，而不是從 XAML 讀取器實作。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Schema.XamlValueConverter`1" /> with <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter" /> constraint that represents type conversion behavior for values of this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得具有 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Schema.XamlValueConverter`1" /> 條件約束的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter" />，這個條件約束表示此 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> 之值的型別轉換行為。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Schema.XamlValueConverter`1" /> with <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter" /> constraint that represents type conversion behavior for values of this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />.
trans-unit.target: 具有 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Schema.XamlValueConverter`1" /> 條件約束的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter" />，這個條件約束表示此 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> 之值的型別轉換行為。

trans-unit.source: If you do not use the default internal CLR reflection technique for a <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType>, calls to this property can invoke <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.LookupTypeConverter%2A> overrides on <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType> derived classes.
trans-unit.target: 如果您未使用的預設內部 CLR 反映技巧<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType>，呼叫這個屬性可以叫用<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.LookupTypeConverter%2A>上覆寫<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType>衍生的類別。

trans-unit.source: For more information about return values and other behavior, see the documentation for <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.LookupTypeConverter%2A> on this type.
trans-unit.target: 如需傳回值和其他行為的詳細資訊，請參閱文件<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.LookupTypeConverter%2A>這個類型上。

trans-unit.source: Gets the CLR <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that underlies this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得做為此 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 之基礎的 CLR <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />。

trans-unit.source: The CLR <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that underlies this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />.
trans-unit.target: 做為此 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 之基礎的 CLR <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Schema.XamlValueConverter`1" /> with <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.ValueSerializer" /> constraint that represents value serialization behavior for values of this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得具有 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Schema.XamlValueConverter`1" /> 條件約束的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.ValueSerializer" />，這個條件約束表示此 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> 之值的值序列化行為。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Schema.XamlValueConverter`1" /> with <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.ValueSerializer" /> constraint that represents value serialization behavior for values of this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 具有 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Schema.XamlValueConverter`1" /> 條件約束的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.ValueSerializer" /> (這個條件約束表示此 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> 之值的值序列化行為)，否則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: If you do not use the default internal CLR reflection technique for a <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType>, calls to this property can invoke <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.LookupValueSerializer%2A> overrides on <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType> derived classes.
trans-unit.target: 如果您未使用的預設內部 CLR 反映技巧<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType>，呼叫這個屬性可以叫用<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.LookupValueSerializer%2A>上覆寫<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType>衍生的類別。

trans-unit.source: For more information about return values and other behavior, see the documentation for <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.LookupValueSerializer%2A> on this type.
trans-unit.target: 如需傳回值和其他行為的詳細資訊，請參閱文件<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.LookupValueSerializer%2A>這個類型上。
